| HistoryText             = To demoralize the Americans during World War II, [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi]] [[Glossary:Fifth Column|Fifth Columnist]] [[Fritz Krone (Earth-616)|Fritz Krone]] dressed his men as robots to attack people in [[New York City]]. They operated from a secret underground base. Krone's plot was uncovered by [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], [[James Buchanan Barnes (Earth-616)|Bucky]], and [[Elizabeth "Betsy" Ross (Earth-616)|Betsy Ross]]. After Captain America and Bucky destroyed Krone's base, Captain America defeated Krone in a one-on-one battle, ending the Earthmen's threat.{{r|Captain America Comics Vol 1 15}}
